acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill in lists of the containing class type
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldSupportRecursiveLists

tag.name: Basic types/Podam factory basic types test

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.pdm6.RecursiveList
Then the Object should not be null
Then the recursive list should not be null
Then the recursive list should not be empty
Then each of the list elements should not be null
